title: Renee Montgomery | Ep 79 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Renee Montgomery | Ep 79 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
2x WNBA champion, Renee Montgomery, joins the boys on episode 79 of ALL THE SMOKE. Montgomery opens up about being the first former player to become both an owner and executive of a WNBA franchise. Plus, she talks about her title runs in Minnesota and her time at UConn where she won the 2009 national championship.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
